Name: ban
Description: Bans the player for the set duration.

Name: banip
Description: Bans the every player with given IP.

Name: iban
Description: Bans the player for the set duration, unmarked message on the room.

Name: mute
Description: Prevent player from speaking for the set duration.

Name: imute
Description: Prevent player from speaking for the set duration, unmarked message on the room.

Name: kick
Description: Disconnects the player from the game.

Name: mumute
Description: Mutes the player without telling them, they see it as if they are sending messages, but nobody else sees the messages (removed on reconnect).

Name: demute
Description: Unmute a player. Do not use /mute 0 to unmute a player!

Name: deban
Description: Removes the last ban from a player's account. Do not use /ban 0 to unban a player!

Name: debanip
Description: Unbans the selected IP address.

Name: clearban
Description: Deletes the voteban on a person.

Name: banhack
Description: Special ban command for cheaters.

Name: ibanhack
Description: Special ban command for cheaters, unmarked message on the room.

Name: prison
Description: Teleports the player to your room and does not let them leave (use again to return them to a normal room.

Name: casier
Description: Gives the list of sanctions received by a player or ip address.

Name: ms
Description: Allows you to put a [Moderation] 'Message' on a room.

Name: nomip
Description: Gives the designated player's IP.

Name: ipnom
Description: Gives the list of accounts linked to the IP address.

Name: ip
Description: Gives the IP and country of a connected player.

Name: l
Description: Gives the list of the 200 previous connections of the requested nickname or IP address, independently of the server reboot for the functioning of nomip/ipnom.

Name: relation
Description: Gives list of related accounts since the last reboot.

Name: closeroom
Description: Dissolves the room you are in. Everyone is kicked out to other rooms.

Name: commu
Description: Changes your community in-game.

Name: room*
Description: Joins the specified room on the specified community.

Name: follow
Description: Joins the room of a specific player. NOTE: Room player limits and passwords are skipped by these commands.

Name: find
Description: Gives the name of the room where a player is.

Name: creator
Description: Returns the first mouse to join room.

Name: ninja
Description: Performs the same functionality as Watch in modopwet, but saves you having to search through modopwet for the report.

Name: ls
Description: Gives the number of mice in a room.

Name: lsroom
Description: Lists the names of the mice in a room and their IP addresses.

Name: lsc
Description: Gives the number of mice per community.

Name: lsarb
Description: Gives the list of connected Arbitres as well as their room.

Name: lsmodo
Description: Gives the list of connected Moderators and Admins as well as their room.

Name: roomkick
Description: Kicks specific player from the room.

Name: clearchat
Description: Clear the room chat.

Name: chatlog
Description: Gives the log of messages by a player.

Name: chatfilter
Description: Adds or removes string to chat filter, or shows all strings in chat filter.

Name: ch
Description: Designates the next Shaman. (Doesn't work as a double shaman!)

Name: del
Description: Sets the given map on category p44 (Deleted).

Name: info
Description: Gives the information of a map.

Name: infocommu
Description: Gives info about which game modes are being played by mice connected to community.

Name: infotribu
Description: Shows information about a tribe (members, cafofo map, date of entry of members, positions and permissions).

Name: lsmap
Description: Gives list a player's maps, with their category.

Name: lsbulle
Description: Gives info about the satellite servers (which host the rooms).

Name: roominfo
Description: Gives info about the current room (players, satellite info and more).

Name: lstribe
Description: Gives the list of tribes with at least one person connected.

Name: lsbots
Description: Gives the list of bots.

Name: max
Description: Gives the maximum number of players connected since the last reboot.

Name: sonar
Description: Gives information about player movement stuff.

Name: mouse_physics
Description: Gives information about player mouse physics stuff.

Name: flog
Description: Returns the IRC log of recent player bans, useful when /casier isn't working, shows room kicks also, but not buffy bans or offline ban reasons.

Name: *flog
Description: Returns the full IRC ban history of a player (takes a lot longer but goes back much further).

Name: stafflog
Description: Shows the given sanctions of a staff member.

Name: modinfo
Description: Searchs for moderator and arbitre alts in the original game.
